name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: Monster Madness continues with this update, further enhancing monster skillsets, AI parameters, damage scaling and more. I've also put a large focus into integrating Summoning Stats into all player summons; they will now gain boosts to everything from speed to resistance piercing based on these special stats. Many bug reports were addressed, public release inches ever closer each update. As always, hope you enjoy my continued efforts - have fun!

D2RLaunch has been re-built from the ground up to be more stable, more efficient and have improved functionality. It will look and behave very similarly to the old D2RLaunch; just now with a more dynamic UI and
implementation. Please give special Thanks to @Alias and all his effort in spearheading this re-vamp. More details of the new and improved D2RLaunch can be found on our discord.
